short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Instantly reveals the font-family of any text element on hover, making it easy to identify and explore fonts used across the web.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
What the Font - Easily Identify Fonts on Any Website

Discover the simplest way to identify fonts on web pages with What the Font. No more digging through developer tools to uncover font styles. With just a hover, you can instantly view the font-family used on any text element. Need more information? A single click will provide detailed styles, making font exploration fast and effortless.

Perfect for web designers, developers, and typography enthusiasts, What the Font makes it easy to uncover the fonts that shape the web. Join the growing community of users who trust What the Font to enhance their design process.
